   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Last change: |today|

Welcome to Catena's documentation!
=====================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Contents:
   
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   systemrequirements

User Guide
-----------
Installation
   Pre-requisites:
      - `MongoDB <https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/installation/>`_ (dependencies across Funkelab packages)

      - `Gurobi <https://ca.cs.uni-bonn.de/doku.php?id=tutorial:gurobi-install>`_ (for Micron: Microtubule tracking)
      - Anaconda/Miniconda
      - Docker/Apptainer: formerly Singularity (to use prebuilt containerised environments) 


Things that have been introduced to optimise `portability/reproducibility`:
   - Docker
   - Onnx
   - Tensorboard Logging
   - Wandb logging (2D only)
   

Contents
==================
Preprocess EM volumes
   Generative Networks (GANS and Diffusion Models):
      - Image translation (Medical Imaging to EM)     
          - DDIB - `Dual Diffusion Implicit Bridges <https://github.com/suxuann/ddib>`_
          - SynDiff - `Adversarial Diffusion Models <https://github.com/icon-lab/SynDiff>`_
          - Mito EM `translation <https://github.com/danifranco/EM_domain_adaptation/tree/main>`_
          - Style transfer with `Constrastive Unpaired Translation <https://github.com/taesungp/contrastive-unpaired-translation>`_
      - Super-resolution (Anisotropic to Isotropic)
         - Numpy/Scipy interpolation
         - EM Diffuse
         - Biapy/ZeroCost - Wassertein GANS
         

           
Organelle Segmentation
   Mitochondria Segmentation:
       - Advanced Deep Networks for `3D Mitochondria Instance Segmentation <https://github.com/Limingxing00/MitoEM2021-Challenge>`_

Neuron Segmentation
   Local Shape Descriptors (Sheridan et al):
       Tensorflow
           - Multi-task models for small datasets
           - Auto Context models for larger datasets
       Pytorch
           - Multi-task models for small datasets
           - Auto Context models for larger datasets

Automatic Synaptic Partner Detection
   Synful  (Buhmann et al):
       Tensorflow (Pretained and Custom)
           - Multi-task models
           - Auto Context models
       Pytorch
           - Multi-task models
Microtubule Tracking
   Micron (Eckstein et al):
       - Tensorflow networks
       - Integer Linear Programming solvers
             - Pylp
             - Ilpy
Neurotransmitter classification
   Synister (Eckstein et al):
     - Pytorch networks



Indices and tables
==================
* :ref:`troubleshoot`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
